results.title: Simvastatin combined with aspirin increases the survival time of heart allograft by activating CD4(+)CD25(+) Treg cells and enhancing vascular endothelial cell protection.
results.text_hl: In addition, CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ given in combination with @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ delayed the development of pathological @<m>DISEASE_Nephrosis_Lipoid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009402 @@@changes@@@ in the @DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@myocardium@@@, reduced @DISEASE_Vascular_System_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D057772 @@@vascular damage@@@ and prolonged the survival time of cardiac allograft.

citations.NLM: Zhu J, Gao B. Simvastatin combined with aspirin increases the survival time of heart allograft by activating CD4(+)CD25(+) Treg cells and enhancing vascular endothelial cell protection. Cardiovasc Pathol. 2015 May-Jun;24(3):173-8. PMID: 25824885
citations.BibTeX: @article{25824885, title={Simvastatin combined with aspirin increases the survival time of heart allograft by activating CD4(+)CD25(+) Treg cells and enhancing vascular endothelial cell protection.}, author={Zhu J and Gao B}, journal={Cardiovasc Pathol}, volume={24}, number={3}, pages={173-8}}

results.title: Atypical presentation of a middle age male with severe hypertriglyceridaemia: a case report
results.text_hl: A 12 lead admission ECG was negative for @<m>DISEASE_Nephrosis_Lipoid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009402 @@@ischaemic changes@@@ apart for peaked T waves.

citations.NLM: Albahrani AI, Usher J J, Marks E, Ranganath L, Shenkin A. Atypical presentation of a middle age male with severe hypertriglyceridaemia: a case report J Med Case Rep. 2007 Jul 14;1():51. PMID: 17629933
